Description: Papyrus fragment bearing a two line Coptic text on both sides: one written along the fibres, the other against. Mounted with EA 10129, 10140, 10141, 10455-6, 10458, 10461.
Curator's comments: Register says 'Found in some tombs in the hills behind Assiut'. Under study by Alain Delattre with a view to publication (updated March 2017).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380625) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380625)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Rev Dr Gulian Lansing
